Copyright \u00a9 2016 hiTour.

v1.0
Initial release of v1.0, fully built from scratch.

Libraries

The hiTour Android app uses the following 3rd party libraries, resources and tools:
- AppCompat
- Design
- Pallete
- ReciclerView
- CardView
- Zxing Android Embedded
- Zxing
- CircleImageView
- Retrofit
- Gson
- Converter Gson
